price: Bitinya Nyagasani wabyo uri hejuru yabyo, kandi bikora ibyo byategetswe.
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
